short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test Automation extension build by QGuard. Run automated tests created using QGuard test automation platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Companion application to the Q-Guard web application, a revolutionary testing solution. 
It allows Q-Guard users to locally and automatically execute test cases. 

Learn more at https://q-guard.app/
